page.title: 02ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: In the village there is some entertainment.There is a jazz band at the Somers Arms Pub and a country and western club.There is a bingo at the local hall.Our school has a school production every year and all the school takes part.We perform it for the old people.The hall committee performs a play with most of the villagers taking part.A lot of the clubs have a disco and hold it in the hall.Mr Wenden owns a big barn and holds country and western bands there. It is held about 2-3 times a year.Also in the village hall the committee organize illustrated lectures on various topics.All this is in addition to Scouts,Cubs,Brownies and Guide groups in the village.Also there are the usual pub pursuits such as darts, crib and dominoes and a quiz team.
